How do I create a new token that can only be converted to with GOLD?

According to the information, creating a new token, such as "mycoin", requires the ability to convert to it with either GOLD or VRSCTEST. This means that you cannot create a new token that can only be converted to with GOLD, as VRSCTEST is also required as a convertible currency.
